function.name: gmail_users_getProfile
function.description: Gets the current user's Gmail profile

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request

function.name: gmail_users_drafts_create
function.description: Drafts and sends a new email

content.description: text describing content of the email message

filename.description: full path of the file if the user wants to add an attachment

labelIds.description: List of IDs of labels applied to this draft

threadId.description: The ID of the thread the draft belongs to

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request

function.name: gmail_users_drafts_update
function.description: Update or modify an existing draft email

content.description: text describing content of the email message

filename.description: full path of the file if the user wants to add an attachment

labelIds.description: List of IDs of labels applied to this draft

threadId.description: The ID of the thread the draft belongs to

id.description: The ID of the draft to update

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request containing draft id

function.name: gmail_users_drafts_delete
function.description: Immediately and permanently deletes the specified draft. Does not simply trash it

id.description: The ID of the draft to delete

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request containing draft id, format https://gmail.googleapis.com/gmail/v1/users/me/drafts/{id}

id.description: The ID of the draft to retrieve

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request containing draft id, format https://gmail.googleapis.com/gmail/v1/users/me/drafts/{id}

function.name: gmail_users_drafts_list
function.description: Lists the drafts in the user's mailbox

maxResults.description: Maximum number of drafts to return. This field defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value for this field is 500

pageToken.description: Page token to retrieve a specific page of results in the list

q.description: Only return draft messages matching the specified query. Supports the same query format as the Gmail search box. For example, 'from:someuser@example.com rfc822msgid:<somemsgid@example.com> is:unread'

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request

messageListVisibility.description: The visibility of messages with this label in the message list in the Gmail web interface.

labelListVisibility.description: The visibility of the label in the label list in the Gmail web interface.

type.description: The owner type for the label.

textColor.description: The text color of the label, represented as hex string

backgroundColor.description: The background color represented as hex string

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request

id.description: The ID of the label to update

messageListVisibility.description: The visibility of messages with this label in the message list in the Gmail web interface.

labelListVisibility.description: The visibility of the label in the label list in the Gmail web interface.

type.description: The owner type for the label.

textColor.description: The text color of the label, represented as hex string

backgroundColor.description: The background color represented as hex string

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request containing the label id, format https://gmail.googleapis.com/gmail/v1/users/me/labels/{id}

id.description: The ID of the label to retrieve

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request containing label id, format: https://gmail.googleapis.com/gmail/v1/users/me/labels/{id}

function.name: gmail_users_labels_delete
function.description: Immediately and permanently deletes the specified label and removes it from any messages and threads that it is applied to

id.description: The ID of the label to delete

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request containing label id, format: https://gmail.googleapis.com/gmail/v1/users/me/labels/{id}

function.name: gmail_users_labels_list
function.description: Lists all labels in the user's mailbox

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request

function.name: gmail_users_messages_trash
function.description: Moves the specified message to the trash

id.description: The ID of the message to trash

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request containing the message id, format: https://gmail.googleapis.com/gmail/v1/users/me/messages/{id}/trash

id.description: The ID of the message to retrieve

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request containing the message id, format: https://gmail.googleapis.com/gmail/v1/users/me/messages/{id}

function.name: gmail_users_messages_list
function.description: Lists the messages in the user's mailbox

maxResults.description: Maximum number of messages to return. This field defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value for this field is 500

pageToken.description: Page token to retrieve a specific page of results in the list

q.description: Only return messages matching the specified query. Supports the same query format as the Gmail search box. For example, 'from:someuser@example.com rfc822msgid:<somemsgid@example.com> is:unread'

labelIds.description: Only return messages with labels that match all of the specified label IDs

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request

function.name: gmail_users_messages_modify
function.description: Modifies the labels on the specified message

id.description: The ID of the message to modify

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request containing message id, format: https://gmail.googleapis.com/gmail/v1/users/me/messages/{id}/modify

function.name: gmail_users_threads_trash
function.description: Moves the specified thread to the trash. Any messages that belong to the thread are also moved to the trash

id.description: The ID of the thread to trash

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request containing message id, format: https://gmail.googleapis.com/gmail/v1/users/me/threads/{id}/trash

id.description: The ID of the thread to retrieve

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request containing message id, format: https://gmail.googleapis.com/gmail/v1/users/me/threads/{id}

function.name: gmail_users_threads_list
function.description: Lists the threads in the user's mailbox

maxResults.description: Maximum number of threads to return. This field defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value for this field is 500

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request

labelIds.description: Only return threads with labels that match all of the specified label IDs

function.name: gmail_users_threads_modify
function.description: Modifies the labels applied to the thread. This applies to all messages in the thread

id.description: The ID of the thread to modify

URL.description: Full URL of the HTTP request containing thread id, format: https://gmail.googleapis.com/gmail/v1/users/me/threads/{id}/modify
